informational.message: Request has been received and is continuing to process.
Server is switching protocols as requested.

success.message: The resource has been created successfully.
The request has been accepted for processing.
The request was successful, but no content is returned.

redirection.message: The resource has moved permanently to a new URI.
The resource has been temporarily moved to a different URI.
The resource has not been modified since the last request.

client_errors.message: Field is invalid.
Incorrect fields.
User role does not have required permissions.
User with given ID not found.
Field already in use.
Course not found with provided ID.
Invalid course title, description or price.
Course is not yet published.
Course with this title already exists.
Instructor user not found.
Instructor can't be assigned to this course.
Order not found with given ID.
Items array is invalid or empty.
Payment not found for this order.
Payment is required to access the course.
This course has already been paid for.
Provided payment method is not supported.
No enrollment found for user and course.
Already enrolled in this course.
Cannot enroll in unpublished/private course.
Review does not exist.
Rating must be between 1 to 5.
Cannot review a course you're not enrolled in.
Module not found in course.
Lesson not found in module.
Lesson position must be a valid integer.
Course category not found.
Category with this name already exists.

server_errors.message: An unexpected error occurred on the server.
The server is currently unavailable (overloaded or down).
The server did not receive a timely response from an upstream server.
The requested feature is not implemented by the server.
The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.
